process_model.name: AS GAM ADT Audit Process
process_model.description: Process model for saving and capturing audit changes of GSS CDTs

expression_rules.name: AS_ADT_UT_determineAuditActionCode
expression_rules.description: Given a newObject, an oldObject, and the auditConfig, determines the auditActionCode

data.sail_code:
choose(
  where(
    {
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!externalAction),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(index(ri!originalObject, ri!auditConfig.idField, null)),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(index(ri!newObject, ri!auditConfig.idField, null)),
      toboolean(index(ri!originalObject, "isActive", 1)) = toboolean(index(ri!newObject, "isActive", 1)),
      toboolean(index(ri!originalObject, "isActive", false)),
      toboolean(index(ri!newObject, "isActive", true))
    }
  )[1],
  ri!externalAction,
  cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_ADD,
  cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_DELETE,
  cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_MODIFY,
  cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_DEACTIVATE,
  cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_REACTIVATE
)
data.definition:
choose(
  where(
    {
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!externalAction),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(index(ri!originalObject, ri!auditConfig.idField, null)),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(index(ri!newObject, ri!auditConfig.idField, null)),
      toboolean(index(ri!originalObject, "isActive", 1)) = toboolean(index(ri!newObject, "isActive", 1)),
      toboolean(index(ri!originalObject, "isActive", false)),
      toboolean(index(ri!newObject, "isActive", true))
    }
  )[1],
  ri!externalAction,
  cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_ADD,
  cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_DELETE,
  cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_MODIFY,
  cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_DEACTIVATE,
  cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_REACTIVATE
)

expression_rules.name: AS_CO_UT_castToDictionaryList
expression_rules.description: Casts the input to a dictionary list

expression_rules.name: AS_ADT_UT_calculateAudit
expression_rules.description: Primary rule to calculate audits between old and new objects (handles arrays or single objects)

data.sail_code:
rule!AS_ADT_UT_calculateAudit_MultipleObjects(
  originalObjects: ri!originalObjects,
  newObjects: ri!newObjects,
  auditConfig: ri!auditConfig,
  username: ri!username,
  externalAction: ri!externalAction,
  auditType: ri!auditType
)
data.definition:
rule!AS_ADT_UT_calculateAudit_MultipleObjects(
  originalObjects: ri!originalObjects,
  newObjects: ri!newObjects,
  auditConfig: ri!auditConfig,
  username: ri!username,
  externalAction: ri!externalAction,
  auditType: ri!auditType
)

expression_rules.name: AS_CO_UT_filterCdtByField
expression_rules.description: Filters a CDT by a matching a single value or list of values in a single field, if a list is passed, all matches are returned

expression_rules.name: AS_CO_UT_indexPath
expression_rules.description: Pass in a field (i.e. member[1].name) and this will index(index(index( for each field

data.sail_code:
with(
  local!fieldsAndIndices: rule!AS_CO_UT_zINTERNAL_indexPath_nestedFieldArrayHandler(field: ri!field),

  reduce(
    index(_, _, ri!indexDefault),
    ri!cdt,
    local!fieldsAndIndices
  )
)
data.definition:
with(
  local!fieldsAndIndices: rule!AS_CO_UT_zINTERNAL_indexPath_nestedFieldArrayHandler(field: ri!field),

  reduce(
    index(_, _, ri!indexDefault),
    ri!cdt,
    local!fieldsAndIndices
  )
)

expression_rules.description: Returns nullableValue only if it is not null. Else returns replacementValue.

  length(a!flatten(ri!value)) = 0
)

expression_rules.description: Creates a dictionary based on the provided field-value pairs. An example implementation is provided as a test case. Returns a dictionary.

data.sail_code:
cast(
   'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Dictionary',
  rule!AS_CO_UT_updateCdtFieldsByFieldValuePairs(
    cdt: rule!AS_CO_UT_returnNullDictionary(),
    fieldValuePairs: ri!fieldValuePairs
  )
)
data.definition:
cast(
   'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Dictionary',
  rule!AS_CO_UT_updateCdtFieldsByFieldValuePairs(
    cdt: rule!AS_CO_UT_returnNullDictionary(),
    fieldValuePairs: ri!fieldValuePairs
  )
)

expression_rules.name: AS_CO_UT_captureMetadataIfUpdated
expression_rules.description: Given two objects, performs a soft comparison on them (i.e. no type compare).  If the fields are all equal, does not update metadata, but otherwise does.

expression_rules.name: AS_CO_UT_distinct
expression_rules.description: Returns the distinct values from a list.

data.sail_code:
cast(
  typeof(ri!value),
  union({ri!value}, {ri!value})
)
data.definition:
cast(
  typeof(ri!value),
  union({ri!value}, {ri!value})
)

expression_rules.name: AS_ADT_UT_captureMetadataDuringAudit
expression_rules.description: Captures metadata of a CDT if it or any of its children were updated, doing the same for all of its complex MULTIPLE children recursively.  Ideally, we should update this to work for all children.

data.sail_code:
rule!AS_CO_UT_captureMetadataIfUpdated(
  originalCdt: ri!oldObject,
  updatedCdt: if(
    rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(touniformstring(index(ri!auditConfig.complexFields, "fieldName", null))),
    ri!newObject,
    rule!AS_CO_UT_updateCdtFieldsByFieldValuePairs(
      cdt: ri!newObject,
      fieldValuePairs: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
        items: ri!auditConfig.complexFields,
        expression: a!localVariables(
          local!complexFieldAuditConfig: fv!item,
          {
            field: local!complexFieldAuditConfig.fieldName,
            value: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
              items: ri!newObject[local!complexFieldAuditConfig.fieldName],
              expression: rule!AS_ADT_UT_captureMetadataDuringAudit(
                newObject: fv!item,
                oldObject: if(
                  isnull(ri!oldObject),
                  null,
                  index(
                    rule!AS_CO_UT_filterCdtByField(
                      cdt: ri!oldObject[local!complexFieldAuditConfig.fieldName],
                      field: local!complexFieldAuditConfig.idField,
                      value: fv!item[local!complexFieldAuditConfig.idField]
                    ),
                    1,
                    null
                  )
                ),
                auditConfig: local!complexFieldAuditConfig,
                modifiedBy: ri!modifiedBy
              )
            )
          }
        )
      )
    )
  ),
  modifiedBy: ri!modifiedBy
)
data.definition:
rule!AS_CO_UT_captureMetadataIfUpdated(
  originalCdt: ri!oldObject,
  updatedCdt: if(
    rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(touniformstring(index(ri!auditConfig.complexFields, "fieldName", null))),
    ri!newObject,
    rule!AS_CO_UT_updateCdtFieldsByFieldValuePairs(
      cdt: ri!newObject,
      fieldValuePairs: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
        items: ri!auditConfig.complexFields,
        expression: a!localVariables(
          local!complexFieldAuditConfig: fv!item,
          {
            field: local!complexFieldAuditConfig.fieldName,
            value: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
              items: ri!newObject[local!complexFieldAuditConfig.fieldName],
              expression: rule!AS_ADT_UT_captureMetadataDuringAudit(
                newObject: fv!item,
                oldObject: if(
                  isnull(ri!oldObject),
                  null,
                  index(
                    rule!AS_CO_UT_filterCdtByField(
                      cdt: ri!oldObject[local!complexFieldAuditConfig.fieldName],
                      field: local!complexFieldAuditConfig.idField,
                      value: fv!item[local!complexFieldAuditConfig.idField]
                    ),
                    1,
                    null
                  )
                ),
                auditConfig: local!complexFieldAuditConfig,
                modifiedBy: ri!modifiedBy
              )
            )
          }
        )
      )
    )
  ),
  modifiedBy: ri!modifiedBy
)

        childId: 6,
        text: "",
        date: today()
      ),
    ),
    'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:ADT}AS_ADT_SAMPLE_ComplexChildMultiple'(
      parentId: 1,
      childId: 7,
      text: "New Text",
      date: today(),
      referenceChild: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:ADT}AS_ADT_SAMPLE_ReferenceChildSingle'(
        childId: 8,
        text: "New Text",
        date: today()
      ),
    )
  }
)}

)
